ðŸ“– Summary: RustNet is a cross-platform network monitoring tool built in Rust that provides real-time visibility into network connections. It offers features like deep packet inspection, connection lifecycle management, and a terminal user interface for monitoring TCP, UDP, ICMP, ARP, and QUIC connections, along with process identification and service name resolution.
